top_stories.title: Elon Musk suggests spate of xAI exits have been push, not pull
top_stories.description: At least nine engineers, including two co-founders, have announced their exits from xAI in the past week, fueling online speculation and raising questions about stability at Musk’s AI company amid mounting controversy.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Bellan
top_stories.content: At least nine engineers, including two co-founders, have announced their exits from xAI in the past week, fueling online speculation and raising questions about stability at Musk’s AI company amid mounting controversy.

top_stories.title: Recorded Future 2026 Report: Cyber Ops Now Core to Global Power
top_stories.description: Co-Founder Christopher Ahlberg Shares New Findings from Key Annual Report Recorded Future, the world’s largest threat intelligence company, today released its 2026 State of Security Report, showing that cyber operations are now inseparable from physical conflict, coercion, and espionage. The report emphasizes that geopolitical fragmentation and the adoption of artificial intelligence... The post Recorded Future 2026 Report: Cyber Ops Now Core to Global Power first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
top_stories.author: PR Newswire
top_stories.content: Co-Founder Christopher Ahlberg Shares New Findings from Key Annual Report Recorded Future, the world’s largest threat intelligence company, today released its 2026 State of Security Report, showing that cyber operations are now inseparable from physical conflict, coercion, and espionage. The report emphasizes that geopolitical fragmentation and the adoption of artificial intelligence... top_stories.title: NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B MoE model is now available in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
top_stories.description: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.
top_stories.author: Dan Ferguson
top_stories.content: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.

top_stories.title: Leading Inference Providers Cut AI Costs by up to 10x With Open Source Models on NVIDIA Blackwell
top_stories.description: A diagnostic insight in healthcare. A character’s dialogue in an interactive game. An autonomous resolution from a customer service agent. Each of these AI-powered interactions is built on the same unit of intelligence: a token. Scaling these AI interactions requires businesses to consider whether they can afford more tokens. The answer lies in better tokenomics Read Article

top_stories.title: GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
top_stories.description: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.
top_stories.content: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.
